price: Ona vam je ukras kad je sa ispaše vraćate i kad je na pašu izgonite.
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا جَمَالٌ حِينَ تُرِيحُونَ وَحِينَ تَسۡرَحُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walakum fīhā jamālun ḥīna turīḥūna waḥīna tasraḥūna
